kzchatbot-desc: Modal end-user interface and admin controls for the Kol-Zchut answers chatbot.
kzchatbot-settings-help-new-users-chatbo: Percentage of new users that will see the chatbot
kzchatbot-settings-help-active-users-lim: Maximum number of active users past which none will be selected for chatbot access
Maximum number of days since last activity during which a user is considered active for purposes of the Active Users Limit
kzchatbot-settings-help-uuid-request-lim: Maximum permitted number of questions for new UUIDs from a single IP address within an hour
kzchatbot-settings-help-cookie-expiry-da: Number of days past a user's last activity when their cookie will expire
kzchatbot-banned-words-title: Kol-Zchut Chatbot Banned Words and Patterns
kzchatbot-banned-words-status-empty: No banned words or patterns currently defined.
kzchatbot-banned-words-form-new-word: Add new banned word or pattern
kzchatbot-banned-words-help-banned-word: When entering a regular expression, enclose in '/' characters.
kzchatbot-banned-words-help-banned-word-: Please include a description for RegEx
kzchatbot-banned-words-help-reply-messag: Message displayed to user when they try to send a banned word or pattern
kzchatbot-banned-words-error-empty-strin: Word or pattern cannot be empty.
kzchatbot-banned-words-error-invalid-reg: You have entered an invalid regular expression.
kzchatbot-slugs-error-alphanumeric-only: Slug should consist of alphanumeric characters and underscores only.
kzchatbot-settings-view-only: You have view-only access to these settings. Contact an administrator to make changes.
kzchatbot-rag-settings-view-only: You have view-only access to the RAG settings. Contact an administrator to make changes.
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-model: Choose the AI model to use for processing
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-num-of-pages: Select the number of pages for the model to process
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-temperature: Set the temperature value for model response randomness
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-system-promp: Enter the system-level instructions for the AI model
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-user-prompt: Enter the user-level instructions for the AI model
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-banned-field: Enter fields to be filtered, separated by commas
kzchatbot-rag-settings-help-rephrase-pro: Instructions for rephrasing the user's question before sending to the model.
kzchatbot-rag-settings-error-api-unreach: The RAG API is unreachable. Please check the URL and try again.
kzchatbot-testing-models-error-unknown: Unable to retrieve model version information
apierror-kzchatbot-api-unreachable: Unable to reach the chatbot API: $1
apierror-kzchatbot-invalid-response: Invalid response from the chatbot API
kzchatbot-testing-batch-input-label: Enter one query per line. Results will be processed sequentially.
kzchatbot-testing-batch-placeholder:
Enter your queries here
One query per line
For example:
What is MediaWiki?
How to edit pages?
kzchatbot-testing-batch-progress-error: $1 of $2 queries processed (stopped due to error)
kzchatbot-testing-batch-network-error: Network error occurred while processing the request
right-kzchatbot-testing: Access the KZ Chatbot testing interface and API
action-kzchatbot-testing: access the KZ Chatbot testing interface and API
right-kzchatbot-no-limits: No limits when using the chatbot
action-kzchatbot-no-limits: use the chatbot without any limits
kzchatbot-testing-batch-clear-all-confir: Are you sure you want to remove all queries?
